title: Regulation (EU) 2020/561 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 23
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (National
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (National 
Research Ethics Committee for Clinical Investigations of Medical Devices) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

(2) The Principal Regulations and these Regulations may be cited together 
as the European Union (National Research Ethics Committee for Clinical 
Investigations of Medical Devices) Regulations 2021 to 2022.

title: Regulation (EU) 2020/561 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 23
heading: 20. (1) The following fees shall be payable by a sponsor to the
text_raw:
20. (1) The following fees shall be payable by a sponsor to the 

relevant National REC: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

€1,500 in respect of each application under Regulation 
8(1), 

 €300 in respect of each application under Regulation 8(2), 
and 

€1,200 in respect of each appeal under Regulation 17 
(which fee shall be refundable if the appeal is successful). 

(2) Where a National REC is satisfied that an application relates to 
a non-commercial clinical investigation, at the discretion of the National 
REC— 

(a) 

the fee payable under paragraph (1)(a) may be reduced to 
€150, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd January, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [726] 3 

(b) 

(c) 

the fee payable under paragraph (1)(b) may be reduced to 
€50, and 

the fee payable under paragraph (1)(c) may be reduced to 
€100. 

(3) The National REC may recover, as a simple contract debt in any 
court of competent jurisdiction, from the person by whom it is payable, 
any amount due and owing to it as a fee payable under this Regulation.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 December, 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [726]

title: Regulation (EU) 2020/561 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 23
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations amend the European Union (National Research Ethics 
Committee for Clinical Investigations of Medical Devices) Regulations 2021. 

These Regulations amend the amount of fess payable in respect of applications 
for National Research Ethics Committee (“National REC”) review of a clinical 
investigation to be conducted in the State or for a National REC review of a 
substantial modification of a clinical investigation and appeals in respect of 
such applications. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [726] 5
